mapper.select: SELECT other_count,other_count-ex_mobile_count,apply_one_mbook_call,apply_two_to_three_mbook_call,not_in_mobile_all_one_month_rate, ex_mobile_count,unex_mobile_call_count FROM dxd_fk.user_mobile_clear_yy WHERE vid=#{vid} LIMIT 1

SELECT other_count-ex_mobile_count as bin_contact_cnt_clr,inbook_count as bin_contact_call_cnt_clr,clex_one_month_action_count+clex_two_to_three_month_action_count as bin_call_atv_cnt_clr, clex_one_month_action_count+clex_one_month_passive_count+clex_two_to_three_month_action_count+clex_two_to_three_month_passive_count as bin_call_cnt_clr, (clex_one_month_action_count+clex_two_to_three_month_action_count)/(clex_one_month_action_count+clex_one_month_passive_count+clex_two_to_three_month_action_count+clex_two_to_three_month_passive_count) as bin_call_atv_rate_clr,unex_mobile_call_count as bin_call_ap_number_clr,family_callcount as bin_home_status FROM dxd_fk.user_mobile_clear_yy WHERE vid=#{vid} LIMIT 1
SELECT unex_mobile_call_count FROM dxd_fk.user_mobile_clear_yy WHERE vid=#{vid}
